20d635e61a40aac99833bfc1f6b59f48 (15:05): Ooooh yeah, I also meant to say: I LOOOVE BLENDER!
3ca36e2808062758fbcf996a981d84f8 (15:06): do people ever complain of extreme motion sickness after extended periods using blender?
978787f9980f25464b8a73e0fc548adf (15:20): don't you play any computer games?ü
3ca36e2808062758fbcf996a981d84f8 (15:30): claviceps_: well i used to get doom sick, which is why i asked
3ca36e2808062758fbcf996a981d84f8 (15:30): claviceps_: spent most of last night hurling, and having nasty blender dreams
3ca36e2808062758fbcf996a981d84f8 (15:31): the Penguins from spheres tutorial shows you a textured penguin but offers no advice on how to do it
3ca36e2808062758fbcf996a981d84f8 (15:31): does texturing come later in the tut?
978787f9980f25464b8a73e0fc548adf (15:31): sounds like you easily get motionsickness; AFAIk most ppl get it when wearing VR gogles
3ca36e2808062758fbcf996a981d84f8 (15:32): claviceps_: yeah, i get horrendously car sick
3ca36e2808062758fbcf996a981d84f8 (15:32): claviceps_: i don't know if i still get sea sick, since i always take stuff before diving :)
978787f9980f25464b8a73e0fc548adf (15:32): there are medications agains that but my advice is just to get used to it through exposure to it
978787f9980f25464b8a73e0fc548adf (15:35): and yes, texturing comes later AFAIK
3ca36e2808062758fbcf996a981d84f8 (15:41): claviceps_: it'll be interesting to see how it's done
3ca36e2808062758fbcf996a981d84f8 (15:42): claviceps_: since the faces aren't what i want to texture, but if i subdivide, i'll change the shape of the penguin
978787f9980f25464b8a73e0fc548adf (15:43): there are different ways; procedural textures, image textures; and there are defferent ways to map that texture to a object
3ca36e2808062758fbcf996a981d84f8 (15:43): but i think what i want is the texturing equivalent of subsurfacing
978787f9980f25464b8a73e0fc548adf (15:43): i prefere UV mapping with images; that understands subdiv now and is gernerally nice
